response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unser persönliches daten ignorieren und nicht adequat schützen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that ignore our personal data and don't protect it adequately? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of data privacy and the fact that some companies still fail to protect personal information adequately. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations about data privacy on twitter.
